# Source URL

https://photon-science.desy.de/facilities/petra_iii/machine/parameters/index_eng.html

---

## Machine Parameters PETRA III (Design Values)  
Electron energy  
|  6.0 GeV  
  
---|---  
Circumference of the storage ring  
|  2304 m  
  
Number of buckets  
|  3840  
  
Number of bunches  
|  960, 480 (multi bunch mode)  
40 (timing mode)  
  
Bunch separation  
|  8 ns, 16 ns  
192 ns  
  
Electron beam current  
|  100 mA (top-up mode)  
  
Horizontal electron beam emittance  
|  1.2 nmrad (rms)  
  
Coupling factor  
|  1%  
  
Vertical electron beam emittance  
|  0.012 nmrad (rms)  
  
Electron beam energy spread  
|  0.1% (rms)  
  
Curvature radius of bending magnets  
|  22.92 m (new part of the ring)  
  
Magnetic field of bending magnet  
|  0.873 T (new part of the ring)  
  
Critical photon energy from bending magnets  
|  20.9 keV (new part of the ring)  
  
##  General Parameters  

Energy:  
|  6 GeV  
  
---|---

|  2304 m  
  
RF:  
|  499,564 MHZ

|  7.685 μsec  
  
Revolution Frequency:  
|  130,1 kHz  
  
Horizontal Emittance:  
|  1.2 nmrad  
  
Emittance Ratio:  
|  1 %  
  
Electron Beam Current:  
|  100 mA  
  
Electron Beam Charge:  
|  769 nC  
  
Number of electrons:  
|  4,8 10^12  
  
Electron Energy Loss per Turn from Dipoles:  
|  1,149 MeV  
  
Overall electron Energy Loss per Turn:  
|  4,66 MeV  
  
Radiation Power (Old Octant Dipoles):  
|  52,3 kW  
  
Radiation Power (New Octant Dipoles):  
|  62,5 kW  
  
Radiation Power (Damping Wigglers):  
|  351 kW  
  
Bunch Number (Multi Bunch Mode):  
|  960, 480  
  
Bunch Number (Time resolved Mode):  
|  40, 60  
  
Electron Beam Lifetime (Multi Bunch Mode):  
|  13 h  
  
Electron Beam Lifetime (Time resolved Mode):  
|  1 h

|  1.5 μrad

| Critical photon energy from bending magnets | 20.9 keV (new part of the ring) |
